decisionTree.label: Decision Tree ID
decisionTree.hint: Decision Tree ID should be presented as a number e.g. 5
decisionTree.errorEmpty: Decision Tree ID is required to create change request
decisionTree.errorValue: Wrong Decision Tree ID format. DT ID should be presented as a number e.g. 5

rbId.label: Reasoning Branch IDs
rbId.errorEmpty: Reasoning Branch ID is required to create change request
rbId.errorCharacterLimit: Sorry, but you reached the limit. You entered {{length}} characters where the threshold is 1000 characters. Please reduce the number of characters.
rbId.errorVerificationFail: Some of the given reasoning branches do not exist

rbSignature.label: Reasoning Branch Signatures
rbSignature.errorEmpty: Reasoning Branch Signature is required to create change request
rbSignature.errorCharacterLimit: Sorry, but you reached the limit. You entered {{length}} characters where the threshold is 1000 characters. Please reduce the number of characters.
rbSignature.errorVerificationFail: Some of the given reasoning branches do not exist

verifying.title: Verifying
verifying.description: We are checking all provided reasoning branches

dialogVerificationError.title: Verification failed
dialogVerificationError.description: Some of the entered Reasoning Branches do not exist. The list of not existing reasoning branch is available on the top of the form.

verificationError.title: Reasoning branches that do not exist
verificationError.description: Below is a list of provided Reasoning branches that do not exist.

aiSolution.label: AI Solution
aiSolution.hint: Set AI Solution for the selected Reasoning Branches
aiSolution.errorEmpty: You cannot submit change request without any changes

aiStatus.label: AI Status
aiStatus.hint: Set AI Status for the selected Reasoning Branches
aiStatus.errorEmpty: You cannot submit change request without any changes

comment.label: Change Request comment
comment.hint: Describe in few words the Change Request reason
comment.errorEmpty: Short description about changes is required for Approval

confirmDialog.title: Submit Change Request?
confirmDialog.description: The Change Request will be sent to the approval queue where Approver will verify and approve or reject proposed changes.

confirmation.title: Congratulations!
confirmation.description: Your change request has been added to the approval queue.

emptyState.title: You don't have any Change Request to verify yet.

errorState.title: Failed to download the list of changes.
errorState.description: Please try to fetch a list of changes if the problem will persist, contact the administrator.

emptyState.description: Click on the Change Request to view its details

dialogReject.title: Reject Change Request?
dialogReject.description: Change Request will be deleted and leave selected Reasoning Branches unchanged.

dialogApprove.title: Approve changes?
dialogApprove.description: Proposed changes will be applied to the selected Reasoning Branches. This will cause a change in AI Decisions for alerts assigned to the chosen Reasoning Branches.

inProgress.title: Generating a report
inProgress.description: Please do not turn off the browser window and wait until the report is ready for download.

errorTimeout.title: Sorry but, your report is too enormous!
errorTimeout.description: We cannot generate your report because of the technical limitations. Please reduce the date range and try again.

validation.length: The username length is between 3 - 30 characters
validation.characters: The username can consist of lowercase, numbers, and special characters like: - _ @ . only

validation.length: The display name length is between 3 - 50 characters

input.placeholder: Password of 8 characters with one digit

length.minLength: The password length is a minimum of 8 characters

validation.letter: The password contains minimum of one letter
validation.digit: The password contains minimum of one digit

popup.content: Are you sure you want to reset {{ user }} user password?
popup.newPassword: New password for {{ user }} is: {{ password }}

analyst.label: Analyst
analyst.hint: The role needed for the analyst to use the chrome extension.

auditor.label: Auditor
auditor.hint: Has access to all reports about the application modules.

admin.label: Admin
admin.hint: Has access and rights to everything in the application and can manage users.

approver.label: Approver
approver.hint: Has Access to the Approval Queue and can reject or approve pending changes.

businessOperator.label: Business Operator
businessOperator.hint: Has access to all Decision Trees, Reasoning Branches, and can manage it.

validation.atLeastOneRole: At least one role must be assigned to the user.

validation.generalValidationError: Failed to save changes. Please make sure that the provided data meets the input field requirements.
validation.insufficientStorage: Failed to save changes to auth server, please try again.
validation.unauthorized: Unauthorized error occured, please log in and try again.
validation.notFound: Not found error occured, please try again.

footer.buttonActionTooltip: Fill required field to enable this button

report.model: The report contains information about all models in SENS Application.
report.decision-tree: The report contains information about changes in Decision Trees.
report.reasoning-branch: The report contains information about changes in Reasoning Branches.
report.user-profile: The report contains complete information about changes in user profiles.
report.change-request: The report is concentrated only on all stages of suggesting changes in Reasoning Branches.
report.security-matrix: The report contains information about the Permissions, Authorities and Roles.
report.users-list: The report contains a list of all users with basic information.
report.cb-triggered-alerts: The report contains a list of alerts that analyst solved differently than AI.

ready.description: Click the button below to generate and download the Report in CSV file

input.placeholder: Enter Reasoning Branch ID number e.g. 1-546

tooltip.incorrectValue: Please enter Reasoning Branch ID in the following format (Decision Tree ID)-(Match Group ID), for example, 1-546

tooltip.emptyInput: Enter Reasoning Branch ID to load details

default.message: You have not loaded any Reasoning Branch yet
default.description: To load Reasoning Branch please enter Reasoning Branch ID and click on the “Load Reasoning Branch” button.

noResults.message: Reasoning Branch with the given ID does not exist

timeOut.message: Could not load Reasoning Branch details because of a connection problem
timeOut.description: Please try again. If a problem persists, contact the administrator.

aiSolution.label: AI Solution
aiSolution.hint: Set AI Solution for the selected Reasoning Branch

status.label: Status
status.hint: Set status for the selected Reasoning Branch

buttonApply.label: Apply Changes
buttonApply.tooltip: This button will be enabled when the AI Solution or Status changes

content.header: Apply changes to the Reasoning Branch {{ branchId }}?
content.description: Changes in the Reasoning Branches will affect the AI Solutions that Analysts will get, for the alerts.

feedback.success: Changes applied to the Reasoning Branch
feedback.failed: Failed to apply changes. Please try again or contact with Administrator.

analyst-home.title: You don't have any permissions to use SENS WebApp yet.

connection.description: There is a communication problem between your computer and the Silent Eight server.

loading.title: This operation takes longer than usual
loading.description: Wait a moment or try again later.

page-not-found.title: This page could not be found
page-not-found.description: This page does not exist or you do not have permission to view this page.
page-not-found.button: Go back to the previous page

access-denied.title: You don't have permission to view this page
access-denied.description: Contact your administrator to request permission to view this page.

not-authenticated.title: You aren't authenticated
not-authenticated.description: To access this page you need to be authenticated. Please log in.

maintenance.title: Silent Eight is currently down for the scheduled update.
maintenance.description: The application will automatically be loaded when Silent Eight will be ready.

session.expireNotification.MESSAGE: Your session will expire in {{ value }}

data.status: If this option is active, the user will be able to log into SENS

userList.emptyState: This list should contain at least one user. Contact the administrator to solve the problem.

load.UNKNOWN: Unknown error occured while loading user profile.

create.UNKNOWN: Unknown error occured while saving new user profile.

update.UNKNOWN: Unknown error occured while updating user profile.

inputDescripions.password: Minimum 8 characters witch at least one letter and digit.

inputPlaceholder.userName: Username that user will use to login, e.g. johnDoe
inputPlaceholder.displayName: Human-readable user name, e.g. John Doe

userName.minlength: Username must be at least 3 characters in length.
userName.pattern: This field cannot contain white-space characters.

password.minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters in length.
password.minOneDigit: Password must contain at least one digit.
password.minOneLetter: Password must contain at least one letter.

repeatPassword.mismatched: Repeat password does not match password.
